import"./App.css";import Home from"./Home";import{useMemo}from"react";import*as anchor from"@project-serum/anchor";import{clusterApiUrl}from"@solana/web3.js";import{getPhantomWallet,getSlopeWallet,getSolflareWallet,getSolletWallet,getSolletExtensionWallet}from"@solana/wallet-adapter-wallets";import{ConnectionProvider,WalletProvider}from"@solana/wallet-adapter-react";import{WalletDialogProvider}from"@solana/wallet-adapter-material-ui";import{createTheme,ThemeProvider}from"@material-ui/core";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var candyMachineId=new anchor.web3.PublicKey(process.env.REACT_APP_CANDY_MACHINE_ID);var network=process.env.REACT_APP_SOLANA_NETWORK;var rpcHost=process.env.REACT_APP_SOLANA_RPC_HOST;var connection=new anchor.web3.Connection(rpcHost);var txTimeout=30000;// milliseconds (confirm this works for your project)
